title: two different fonts
author: sunshine7711us

comments.content: "GREEN BAY" is **[A&S Jiggy Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317152742/http:/artandsignstudio.com/jiggyroman.html)** by Art&Sign Studio

"Welcome to" & "Bar & Grill" is **CAC Shishoni Brush** by American Greetings Corporation [1996]  
More on American Greetings Corporation:  
 [http://luc.devroye.org/fonts-46439.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317152742/http:/luc.devroye.org/fonts-46439.html "http://luc.devroye.org/fonts-46439.html")
Thanks so much on the second font type! I've had such a hard time finding that!
